description: Non material minor amendment to planning permission reference P2012/0424/FUL (dated 02/07/2013) in order to change the size and location of ventilation louvres and doors.
site_name: Land Rear Of Carronade Court And 62 - 64
decision_conditions:
Condition 1 of planning permission ref: P2012/0424/FUL should read:

DRAWING AND DOCUMENT NUMBERS:  The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans:

32-HAL-00500 rev D, 502 rev D, 503 rev D, 504 rev D, 505 rev D, 506 rev D, 507 rev E, 853 rev A, 854 rev A, 855 rev A, 32-HAL-00147-21233-ISL-ARC Rev E, Planning Statement (Halcrow, December 2012), Design and Access Statement (Halcrow, December 2012), Summary of Documents for Local Validation Requirements (Encor, December 2012), Sustainable Design and Construction Statement (Halcrow, February 2013), materials details (1x A4 sheet), Operational Noise Assessment (Halcrow, February 2013), Islington Grid Ambient Noise Survey Report (Parsons Brinckerhoff, April 2011).

REASON: To comply with Section 70(1)(a) of the Town and Country Act 1990 as amended and the Reason for Grant and also for the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
